sentences: Negotiations on Thursday 'went into top gear, then stalled,' according to one delegate.

While numerous negotiations and consultations were scheduled throughout the day and into the night, some participants were openly questioning how much genuine progress was resulting on the key issues, with little movement reported.

The decision to refer some JI matters to ministers and other senior officials at next week's high-level segment was also seen as a clear acknowledgement that not all outstanding issues can be dealt with in a 'technical' setting, raising fears that some aspects of the Bonn Agreements are being relitigated.
enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
